4.14.20  9:20 pm   How do you find out something you don't know?

      by surprise

4.14.20  9:04 pm   is there such thing as a bad question

      they're all bad

4.14.20  8:55 pm   No question. I just wanted to thank you for making such great music.

      i would like to thank you for thanking me, and also inform you that i am making more

4.14.20  8:49 pm   what is the key to success?

      everything is success, and everything is keys. which keys you use to which success, is your own design

4.14.20  8:09 pm   Do you enjoy making videos and music?

      oh heck yeah

4.14.20  7:55 pm   How do you feel about being a prophet and single-handedly predicting everything happening in 2020 by your song "Outside"? (I showed my friend your song and he wouldn't believe this song was written in 2017)

      i am excited to predict some more stuff

4.14.20  7:49 pm   how do you make your videos

      ......~~~ we'll find out ~~~ ...........

4.14.20  7:41 pm   I know this isn't a question but I'm gonna say it anyway. Your songs really make me happy and I love you for them. Thanks, Bill!!!

      holy clothed ken doll you are very friendly

4.14.20  7:23 pm   how is circle a sqare

      could be a cylinder, viewed in orthographic projection, from different angles

4.14.20  7:17 pm   where were you on the night of the incident?

      at a location

4.14.20  7:04 pm   hi bill first of all i would like to apologise for that one time i sent you an email 3 years ago, and i also have a question. i noticed from your reality videos that you have an idea bank and you used a random number generator to let you pick a project to start on. do you ever feel like one idea is better than another?

     YES THEY ARE ALL EXTREMELY BETTER AND WORSE THAN EACH OTHER, THAT IS PRECISELY THE PROBLEM

     and if so then do you think it would be better to start from working on the best ideas and progressively get to the less good ones?

     the problem is that the ideas are all simultaneously better and worse than each other. it's like if you have ever put on those red/cyan anaglyph 3D glasses and stared at a white wall. you are literally seeing red and blue at the same time and your brain tries to explode

     or are all project ideas equal in your mind?

     not even close

     plus some will probably take longer than others so maybe you would postpone those for later?

     shortest first can be a good strategy when trying to learn something brand new and overwhelming

     sorry if this has already been asked

4.14.20  6:30 pm   How do you like your eggs? 

      HATCHED

4.14.20  6:09 pm   I've heard through the grapevine that you're learning new 3-d stuff, first i want to ask if its true

     yes, but that's not necessarily the whole story

      and second if it is, how's it going?

      ok

4.14.20  6:05 pm   Is cereal soup

      cereal is nothing

4.14.20  6:05 pm   Is the 3D animation gonna be near feature-length? Will it have a plot arc? Main characters?

      it would be convenient to have that skill set

4.14.20  6:03 pm   what is your aesthetic

      rugs,

4.14.20  6:02 pm   will you ever do a meet and greet

      meet, not greet

      they could be blind i suppose

      what if it is to test how smart they can be

      some kind of floatation device

4.14.20  5:20 pm   is this all a simulation?

      of what

      yes

4.14.20  4:47 pm    cause of quarantine are you not outside? 

      yes

      i did not. there has never been a font on the questions page. if you noticed a font change, it must have been you who changed your own font

      could be some type of mind control

      no

      pretty good

      could be you

      you

      no

      it's ok

      never heard of it

4.14.20  3:02 pm   In which direction does the earth spin?

      east

4.14.20  2:57 pm   how can I be smart?

      ah, i'm glad you asked that. what i would recommend is something called the 'brain technique'

      i like to use what i call the 'brain technique'

4.14.20  2:46 pm   will you release something you are working on to the expert page?

      of course

      could be some type of ............................person

      learn to do what i do

      smaller than the mall

      that would be difficult considering that we are both alive at the same time

      a log, that's alive

4.14.20  12:10 pm   is any thing real?

      oh that would explain a lot

      obviously one of the 1 dollar places in manhattan. however they are not open right now due to temporary apocalypse
